name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】げまずえでぃしょん!!!!【#ホロゲマズ結成記念LIVE2024】 [qIbjRU2Mo8I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone and Nekomata Okayu perform 'REMOCON'.
Hololive Gamers MC segment and merchandise announcement.

subtitles.original: 気にしないのがあなたのポリシー？
subtitles.english: Is it your policy to not care?

subtitles.original: 悩んでいてもお腹は減るし
subtitles.english: Even if you're worried, you still get hungry

subtitles.original: なんだかんだで世間はヘルシー
subtitles.english: In one way or another, the world is healthy

subtitles.original: お気を確かに ぬるま湯脱皮ー
subtitles.english: Get a grip, molting from the lukewarm water

subtitles.original: Uhhh... Wow!
subtitles.english: Uhhh... Wow!

subtitles.original: もうちょっとでスキマ埋まるのに
subtitles.english: The gaps were almost filled

subtitles.original: なのにね
subtitles.english: And yet...

subtitles.original: どうやってもうまくいかね
subtitles.english: Doesn't work out no matter what I do

subtitles.original: ああ もう 時間が
subtitles.english: Ah, time is already...

subtitles.original: 足りない
subtitles.english: Running out

subtitles.original: 座る 座る Oh SIT DOWN PLEASE
subtitles.english: Sit down, sit down, oh SIT DOWN PLEASE

subtitles.original: フィードバックに体預けて
subtitles.english: Entrusting your body to the feedback

subtitles.original: 廻る 廻る Oh TURN IT AROUND
subtitles.english: Turn, turn, oh TURN IT AROUND

subtitles.original: 唸りを上げて モーター状態
subtitles.english: Roaring like a motor

subtitles.original: 踊る 踊る Oh DANCIN' NIGHT
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, oh DANCIN' NIGHT

subtitles.original: マッシュアップでもれなくアガる
subtitles.english: Mix it up and get fired up without exception

subtitles.original: 声をあげて SINGIN' NOW
subtitles.english: Raise your voice, SINGIN' NOW

subtitles.original: あの子みたいなヒトになりたい
subtitles.english: I want to be like that person

subtitles.original: 座る 座る Oh SIT DOWN PLEASE
subtitles.english: Sit down, sit down, oh SIT DOWN PLEASE

subtitles.original: (UP SIDE DOWN A B A B B A B A A B A B)
subtitles.english: (UP SIDE DOWN A B A B B A B A A B A B)

subtitles.original: 廻る 廻る Oh TURN IT AROUND
subtitles.english: Turn, turn, oh TURN IT AROUND

subtitles.original: (L R L R STOP & DASH & L R L R STOP & DASH)
subtitles.english: (L R L R STOP & DASH & L R L R STOP & DASH)

subtitles.original: 踊る 踊る Oh DANCIN' NIGHT
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, oh DANCIN' NIGHT

subtitles.original: (UP SIDE DOWN A B A B B A B A A B A B)
subtitles.english: (UP SIDE DOWN A B A B B A B A A B A B)

subtitles.original: 声をあげて SINGIN' NOW
subtitles.english: Raise your voice, SINGIN' NOW

subtitles.original: (L R L R STOP & DASH & L R L R B A B A)
subtitles.english: (L R L R STOP & DASH & L R L R B A B A)

subtitles.original: あの子みたいなヒトになりたい
subtitles.english: I want to be like that person

subtitles.original: やったー！よかったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! That was great!

subtitles.original: リモコンすごかった！
subtitles.english: Remocon was amazing!

subtitles.original: すごかったねー！
subtitles.english: It was amazing, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: リモコンすごかった？
subtitles.english: Was Remocon amazing?

subtitles.original: フブミオもすごかったよ！
subtitles.english: Fubumio was amazing too!

subtitles.original: え？最後どうなってんのあれ？
subtitles.english: Eh? What happened at the end there?

subtitles.original: そうだよ！
subtitles.english: Right!

subtitles.original: わかんないよ、あれどうなったんだろうね。
subtitles.english: I don't know, what happened with that?

subtitles.original: あれはちょっとね、ご想像に...
subtitles.english: That was a little... We'll leave it to...

subtitles.original: お任せしまーす！
subtitles.english: ...your imagination!

subtitles.original: え、いいのね？いろんな想像しちゃっていいのね？
subtitles.english: Eh, is it okay? Can we imagine all sorts of things?

subtitles.original: いいのね... 逆にね！
subtitles.english: It's okay... On the contrary!

subtitles.original: 逆にね、どんな想像する気だよ。
subtitles.english: On the contrary, what kind of things are you thinking of?

subtitles.original: でもリモコンめちゃめちゃよかった！
subtitles.english: But Remocon was really great!

subtitles.original: よかった！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: It was great! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ちなみに言えなかった、L...R...
subtitles.english: By the way, I couldn't say the L...R...

subtitles.original: 最後まで言えなかった。
subtitles.english: I couldn't say it until the end.

subtitles.original: あれ難しいよね。
subtitles.english: That's hard, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 難しいよね。練習頑張ったよね。
subtitles.english: It is hard. You worked hard on practicing!

subtitles.original: 頑張ったよー！
subtitles.english: You worked hard!

subtitles.original: さてさて、まだまだですね、もうちょっとだけ「げまずえでぃしょん」続くんですけども。
subtitles.english: Well, well, it's not over yet, "Gamers Edition" will continue for a little longer.

subtitles.original: その前にちょっとグッズの告知をしていこうかと。
subtitles.english: But before that, I'd like to make a quick announcement about merchandise.

subtitles.original: おおー！グッズが出るんですか！
subtitles.english: Oh! Merchandise is coming out!?

subtitles.original: グッズでございます！告知です！こちらご覧ください！
subtitles.english: It is merchandise! An announcement! Please take a look at this!

subtitles.original: ホロライブゲーマーズ結成記念グッズです！
subtitles.english: Hololive Gamers Formation Anniversary Goods!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！見ろ見ろー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Look, look!

subtitles.original: ということで、まずは1つ目はこちら！
subtitles.english: So, first of all, here's the first item!

subtitles.original: こちら！はい！アクリルスタンドです！
subtitles.english: This! Yes! It's acrylic stands!

subtitles.original: こちらオトッ先生に描き下ろしていただきました。
subtitles.english: These were drawn by Ototsu-sensei for this occasion.

subtitles.original: 今回は我々サイバーでゲーマーな感じということで。
subtitles.english: For this time, we have a cyber and gamer-like feel.

subtitles.original: アイドル性も忘れない、凄まじいこのイラスト！
subtitles.english: But don't forget the idol-like quality, it's an amazing illustration!

subtitles.original: 衣装も新規の...
subtitles.english: The outfits are also new...

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。新しい衣装を作ってもらったんだよね。
subtitles.english: Right, right. We had new outfits made!

subtitles.original: そうなんです、これめちゃめちゃ可愛いですよ。
subtitles.english: That's right, these are super cute.

subtitles.original: 次もありますよ、次もポンと、おかころバージョンもございます！
subtitles.english: There's more, here's the next one, there's also an OkaKoro version!

subtitles.original: 背景は今回のライブステージをイメージした大型パーツも付いていますので。
subtitles.english: The background includes large parts inspired by this live stage.

subtitles.original: 4人並べると大迫力で楽しめます！
subtitles.english: So if you line up the four of them, you can enjoy it with great impact!

subtitles.original: 完璧に4つ揃えたらいいよね。
subtitles.english: It'll be great if you get all four!

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ全員分飾ってください。お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please decorate with everyone's part. Please do!

subtitles.original: では続いて、2つ目はこちら！カードスリーブ！
subtitles.english: Next, the second item is this! Card sleeves!

subtitles.original: おおー！これあれだ、サムネでも載ってた！
subtitles.english: Oh! This is the one from the thumbnail!

subtitles.original: そうなんです。さかなへん先生に書いていただきました！
subtitles.english: That's right. Sakanahen-sensei drew it for us!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！可愛いー！めちゃめちゃ可愛いですね。
subtitles.english: Yay! Cute! These are super cute, aren't they?

subtitles.original: こちら、一般的なカードが入るサイズとなっておりますので。使い勝手抜群でございます！
subtitles.english: These are a size that fits general cards, so they're very practical!

subtitles.original: 60枚も入ってるのか。そうなんです、60枚。いっぱいだね。
subtitles.english: Whoa, it contains 60 sleeves. That's right, 60. That's a lot!

subtitles.original: hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAMEのカードも入ります！
subtitles.english: Hololive Official Card Game cards also fit!

subtitles.original: 確かに、ホロカ！最近ホロカいっぱい出てるもんね。
subtitles.english: Indeed, HoloCa! HoloCa has been releasing a lot lately.

subtitles.original: ぜひとも好きに使ってください。必要性ある。
subtitles.english: Please use them however you like. There's a need for these.

subtitles.original: さてさて続いて3つ目はこちら！ラバーマット！
subtitles.english: Now then, for the third item, here it is! Rubber mat!

subtitles.original: こちらスリーブとお揃いとなっております。最高。
subtitles.english: This matches the sleeves. The best.

subtitles.original: これはゲーマーズ好きな人はたまらないね。たまらん、たまらん。
subtitles.english: People who like Gamers will love this. Can't resist, can't resist.

subtitles.original: このラバーマット、ホロカでも使っていただきたいですね。確かに。
subtitles.english: I'd definitely like you to use this rubber mat for HoloCa too. For sure.

subtitles.original: 対戦でもぜひぜひご利用ください。可愛いー。欲しいよねー。
subtitles.english: Please use it in battles too. Cute! We want it, don't we?
